about_me: Hey there! I'm Abhijit Bhattacharjee, a FullStack Web Developer who thrives on crafting innovative web solutions using the MERN stack and TypeScript. As a passionate coder, I enjoy building responsive applications that enhance user experience and I'm always excited for new challenges 🌍. Recently, I developed an online booking system boosting client appointments by 70%! 🤖 Let's create something amazing together.

experience.description: Developed a responsive website for a cleaning service using React and Next.js. Implemented an online booking system that increased client appointments by 70%.
Improved site speed and performance by 20% and developed a dynamic website with admin panels using sanity.
Built and maintained websites codebase for client. Developed a corporate website with a custom CMS for content management.
